ygData.subject: Re: Thermal Cloak
ygData.msgSnippet: I m Fairly new to this list, so I m not sure what has been discussed before I was here, so if this has been mentioned or brought up before please excuse it.
ygData.messageBody:
I'm Fairly new to this list, so I'm not sure what has been discussed before
I was here, so if this has been mentioned or brought up before please excuse
it.

Isn't there a quest in Kaladim that yields a cloak as a reward? I was
thinking it was a cleric or paladin quest, and had something to do with
faction with the Underfoot people. I could be wrong, its something to think
about.

Nicodemious the Neverlost
"What WOULD I like my tombstone to say?"




>OK first of all I think that tattred gnomish cloak can be MADE from err
>tailoring skill, and I saw a few posts that you can aquire the scteches
>somewhere in Kelethin ( Wood Elf City, ahh those sexy women of theirs :))
>
>
>second this would be a very prized item to have , for dragon raids I would
>suspec it would be somthing like 20 sv cold 20 sv fire. and the high lvl
>people would be glad to buy it! So it is also away to make contacts for
>dragon / and even plane raids.
>
>anyways . as a necro I can not buy in klethin so I can;t find out where the
>sketches are. but if somoene can go ahead and try it:)
